aspect: - A man has been arrested in connection with the death of a transgender escort who was found strangled and beaten last month in Fulham.
- Her body was found in a £400,000 flat in Fulham having been strangled and beaten to death.
- A 23-year-old man was arrested in connection with her death but has been bailed.
- Police are appealing to anyone who may have had contact with Miss Santillan in the hours before her death.
- Miss Santillan spoke of her love for London and Paris online in the weeks before her death.
- Miss Santillan's body was found when London Ambulance Service was called to an address in Fulham.
explain: A man has been arrested in connection with the death of a transgender escort who was found strangled and beaten last month in Fulham.

The core idea of this aspect is that Vanessa Santillan was found strangled and beaten to death in a £400,000 flat in Fulham in London. The implication is that she had been murdered and her body was discovered in the luxurious apartment. The fact that she was beaten to death and strangled indicates that the person or persons who killed her used violent means to do so. This aspect adds a tragic and violent element to the story of Vanessa Santillan's life and death.
The aspect states that a 23-year-old man was arrested in connection with Vanessa Santillan's death but was later released without being charged.

Police are appealing to anyone who may have had contact with Miss Santillan in the hours before her death. This means that they are asking anyone who may have been in contact with Vanessa Santillan before her death to come forward and share any information they may have about the incident. This can include people she may have met through her work as a transgender escort or any other interactions she may have had during that time. By gathering this information, the police hope to better understand what happened and potentially identify those responsible for her death.

The given aspect highlights that Vanessa Santillan expressed her love for London and Paris on her online platform in the weeks preceding her death. This provides insight into her experiences and interests as a transgender escort in London.

The aspect states that when London Ambulance Service was called to an address in Fulham, the body of Vanessa Santillan was found. This implies that the London Ambulance Service were the ones who discovered her body.
